property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN P.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: fieldName
property.value: DECODE('(' || U.AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(U.PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(U.PHONE,4),'()-',' ','(0)0-',' ', '(' || U.AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(U.PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(U.PHONE,4)) AS AGENT_PHONE

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN P.PENDING_PAL IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE P.PENDING_PAL END AS PENDING_PAL

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(P.PENDING_PAL_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE TO_CHAR(P.PENDING_PAL_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') END AS PENDING_PAL_DATE

property.name: table
property.value: CPOWNER.PAROLEE P, CPOWNER.PLM_CDC PLM, CPOWNER.PLM_PC290_INFO_VIEW PC290, CPOWNER.CLASSIFICATION C, CPOWNER.EYECOLOR E, CPOWNER.HAIRCOLOR H, CPOWNER.RACE R, CPOWNER.AGENT A, CPOWNER.UNIT U, CPOWNER.STATE S, CPOWNER.STATE S1, CPOWNER.COUNTY CT

property.name: fullcondition
property.value: P.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND P.CDC_NUM = PC290.CDC_NUM(+) AND P.CLASSIFICATION_CODE = C.CLASSIFICATION_CODE(+) AND P.EYECOLOR_CODE = E.EYECOLOR_CODE(+) AND P.HAIRCOLOR_CODE = H.HAIRCOLOR_CODE(+) AND P.RACE_CODE = R.RACE_CODE(+) AND P.AGENT_CODE = A.AGENT_CODE AND P.UNIT_CODE = A.UNIT_CODE AND A.UNIT_CODE = U.UNIT_CODE AND P.PAROLE_STATE = S.STATE_CODE AND P.BIRTHSTATE_CODE = S1.STATE_CODE(+) AND P.COUNTY_COMMIT = CT.COUNTY_CODE(+)

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: P.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND PLM.LAST_CHG_DATE>=TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND P.CDC_NUM = PC290.CDC_NUM(+) AND P.CLASSIFICATION_CODE = C.CLASSIFICATION_CODE(+) AND P.EYECOLOR_CODE = E.EYECOLOR_CODE(+) AND P.HAIRCOLOR_CODE = H.HAIRCOLOR_CODE(+) AND P.RACE_CODE = R.RACE_CODE(+) AND P.AGENT_CODE = A.AGENT_CODE AND P.UNIT_CODE = A.UNIT_CODE AND A.UNIT_CODE = U.UNIT_CODE AND P.PAROLE_STATE = S.STATE_CODE AND P.BIRTHSTATE_CODE = S1.STATE_CODE(+) AND P.COUNTY_COMMIT = CT.COUNTY_CODE(+)

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN A.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: fieldName
property.value: DECODE('(' || A.AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(A.PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.PHONE,4),'()-',' ','(0)0',' ', '(' || A.AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(A.PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.PHONE,4)) AS FULL_PHONE

property.name: fieldName
property.value: DECODE('(' || A.MESSAGE_AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(A.MESSAGE_PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.MESSAGE_PHONE,4),'()-',' ','(0)0',' ', '(' || A.MESSAGE_AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(A.MESSAGE_PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.MESSAGE_PHONE,4)) AS MESSAGE_PHONE

property.name: table
property.value: CPOWNER.ADDRESS A, CPOWNER.PLM_CDC PLM, CPOWNER.COUNTY C

property.name: fullcondition
property.value: A.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND A.COUNTY_CODE = C.COUNTY_CODE(+) AND A.ADDRESS_EFF_DATE = ( SELECT MAX (B.ADDRESS_EFF_DATE) FROM CPOWNER.ADDRESS B WHERE A.CDC_NUM = B.CDC_NUM )

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: A.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND A.COUNTY_CODE = C.COUNTY_CODE(+) AND A.ADDRESS_EFF_DATE = ( SELECT MAX (B.ADDRESS_EFF_DATE) FROM CPOWNER.ADDRESS B WHERE A.CDC_NUM = B.CDC_NUM ) AND ( A.CREATED_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR A.LAST_CHG_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') )

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN A.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: fieldName
property.value: TO_CHAR(A.ADDRESS_EFF_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY')|| chr(176) || A.CAREOF|| chr(176) || A.STREET|| chr(176) || A.CITY_NAME|| chr(176) || A.STATE_CODE||chr(176)|| A.COUNTY_CODE||chr(176) || C.COUNTY_NAME||chr(176)|| A.ZIP||chr(176)|| A.ZIP4||chr(176)|| DECODE('(' || A.AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(A.PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.PHONE,4),'()-',' ','(0)0',' ', '(' || A.AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(A.PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.PHONE,4)) ||chr(176)|| DECODE('(' || A.MESSAGE_AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(A.MESSAGE_PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.MESSAGE_PHONE,4),'()-',' ','(0)0',' ', '(' || A.MESSAGE_AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(A.MESSAGE_PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.MESSAGE_PHONE,4)) ||chr(176)|| A.MAP||chr(176)|| TO_CHAR(A.LAST_CHG_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') as PREV_ADDRESSES

property.name: table
property.value: CPOWNER.ADDRESS A, CPOWNER.COUNTY C, CPOWNER.PLM_CDC PLM

property.name: fullcondition
property.value: A.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND A.COUNTY_CODE = C.COUNTY_CODE(+) AND A.ADDRESS_EFF_DATE < ( SELECT MAX (B.ADDRESS_EFF_DATE) FROM CPOWNER.ADDRESS B WHERE A.CDC_NUM = B.CDC_NUM )

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: A.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND A.COUNTY_CODE = C.COUNTY_CODE(+) AND A.ADDRESS_EFF_DATE < ( SELECT MAX (B.ADDRESS_EFF_DATE) FROM CPOWNER.ADDRESS B WHERE A.CDC_NUM = B.CDC_NUM ) AND ( A.CREATED_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR A.LAST_CHG_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') )

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN A.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: A.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND ( A.CREATED_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR A.LAST_CHG_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') )

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN J.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: fieldName
property.value: J.EMPLOYER||chr(176)||J.STREET||chr(176)||J.CITY_NAME||chr(176)||J.STATE_CODE||chr(176)||J.COUNTY_CODE||chr(176)||J.ZIP||chr(176)||J.ZIP4||chr(176)||DECODE('(' || J.AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(J.PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(J.PHONE,4),'()-',' ','(0)0',' ', '(' || J.AREA_CODE || ')' || SUBSTR(J.PHONE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(J.PHONE,4))||chr(176)||J.JOB_TITLE||chr(176)||J.EMP_AWARE||chr(176)||TO_CHAR(J.START_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY')||chr(176)||TO_CHAR(J.LAST_CHG_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY')||chr(176) AS EMPLOYER_INFO

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: J.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND ( J.CREATED_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR J.LAST_CHG_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') )

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN M.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: M.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND ( M.CREATED_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR M.LAST_CHG_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') )

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN O.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: fieldName
property.value: O.OFFENSE_CODE||chr(176)||T.OFFENSE_DESC ||chr(176)|| T.TYPE ||chr(176)|| T.SEVERITY ||chr(176)|| O.CONTROLLING_OFFENSE ||chr(176)||TO_CHAR(O.LAST_CHG_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY')||chr(176) AS OFFENSE_INFO

property.name: table
property.value: CPOWNER.OFFENSE O, CPOWNER.OFFENSE_TYPE T, CPOWNER.PLM_CDC PLM

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: O.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND O.OFFENSE_CODE = T.OFFENSE_CODE(+) AND ( O.CREATED_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR O.LAST_CHG_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') )

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN P.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: fullcondition
property.value: P.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND P.PROBLEM_NARCOTIC IS NOT NULL AND P.PROBLEM_ALCOHOL IS NOT NULL AND P.PROBLEM_ASSAULT IS NOT NULL AND P.PROBLEM_SEX IS NOT NULL AND P.PROBLEM_OTHER IS NOT NULL

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: P.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND P.PROBLEM_NARCOTIC IS NOT NULL AND P.PROBLEM_ALCOHOL IS NOT NULL AND P.PROBLEM_ASSAULT IS NOT NULL AND P.PROBLEM_SEX IS NOT NULL AND P.PROBLEM_OTHER IS NOT NULL AND ( P.CREATED_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR P.LAST_CHG_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') )

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN S.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: fieldName
property.value: S.SMT_CODE ||chr(176)|| REPLACE(S.SMT_DESC,'|',',') ||chr(176)||REPLACE(S.SMT_PICTURE,'|',',') ||chr(176)|| REPLACE(S.SMT_TEXT,'|',',') || chr(176)|| TO_CHAR(S.LAST_CHG_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY')||chr(176) AS SMT_INFO

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN S.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: S.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND ( S.CREATED_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR S.LAST_CHG_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') )

property.name: fieldName
property.value: CASE WHEN V.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ACTION

property.name: fieldName
property.value: V.MAKE_CODE ||chr(176)|| VM.MAKE_DESC ||chr(176)|| V.MODEL_CODE ||chr(176)|| VM.MODEL_DESC ||chr(176)||V.STYLE_CODE ||chr(176)|| VS.STYLE_DESC ||chr(176)|| V.VEHICLE_CLASS ||chr(176)|| V.YEAR ||chr(176)||V.COLOR1 ||chr(176)|| VC1.COLOR_DESC || chr(176)|| V.COLOR2 ||chr(176)|| VC2.COLOR_DESC ||chr(176)|| V.LICENSE_PLATE ||chr(176)|| V.STATE_CODE || chr(176) || S.STATE_NAME ||chr(176)|| TO_CHAR(V.START_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') ||chr(176)|| TO_CHAR(V.LAST_CHG_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') ||chr(176)|| V.VEHICLE_OWNED ||chr(176)|| V.VEHICLE_MAKE_ID ||chr(176) AS VEHICLE_INFO

property.name: table
property.value: CPOWNER.VEHICLE V, CPOWNER.VEHICLE_MAKE VM, CPOWNER.VEHICLE_STYLE VS, CPOWNER.VEHICLE_COLOR VC1, CPOWNER.VEHICLE_COLOR VC2, CPOWNER.PLM_CDC PLM, CPOWNER.STATE S

property.name: fullcondition
property.value: V.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND ( V.MAKE_CODE = VM.MAKE_CODE AND V.MODEL_CODE = VM.MODEL_CODE ) AND ( V.STYLE_CODE = VS.STYLE_CODE(+) ) AND V.COLOR1 = VC1.COLOR_CODE(+) AND V.COLOR2 = VC2.COLOR_CODE(+) AND V.STATE_CODE = S.STATE_CODE(+)

property.name: partialcondition
property.value: V.CDC_NUM = PLM.CDC_NUM AND ( V.MAKE_CODE = VM.MAKE_CODE AND V.MODEL_CODE = VM.MODEL_CODE ) AND ( V.STYLE_CODE = VS.STYLE_CODE(+) ) AND V.COLOR1 = VC1.COLOR_CODE(+) AND V.COLOR2 = VC2.COLOR_CODE(+) AND V.STATE_CODE = S.STATE_CODE(+) AND ( V.CREATED_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR V.LAST_CHG_DATE > TO_DATE('${LAST_DATA_EXTRACT_UPTO_DATE}','DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') )
